SuperRobot:NewDualcast.NAME: Dualcast
SuperRobot:NewDualcast.DESCRIPTION: Deal 1 damage. NL Evoke your next Orb 2 times.

Beam Cell.NAME: Beam Cell
Beam Cell.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable and Weak.

Conserve Battery.NAME: Charge Battery
Conserve Battery.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain [B] [B].

Hello World.NAME: Hello World
Hello World.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a random Common card into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn.
Hello World.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add a random Common card into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn.

Biased Cognition.NAME: Correct Cognition
Biased Cognition.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Focus. NL At the start of your turn, lose 1 Focus. NL Focus will not become negative.

Blizzard.NAME: Blizzard
Blizzard.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times the number of Frost Channeled this combat to ALL enemies.
Blizzard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times the number of Frost Channeled this combat to ALL enemies. NL Channel 1 Frost.

Steam Power.NAME: Overclock
Steam Power.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Add a *Dazed into your discard pile.

Seek.NAME: Seek
Seek.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! card from your draw pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.
Seek.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Put !M! cards from your draw pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.

Auto Shields.NAME: Auto-Shields
Auto Shields.DESCRIPTION: If you have no Block, gain !B! Block. NL If you have empty orbs, gain extra !M! Block.

Echo Form.NAME: Nightmare Echo
Echo Form.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL No escape from this Card. NL The first card you play each turn is played twice. Costs 1 additional [B] NL for each time this card is played or exhausted.
Echo Form.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: NL No escape from this Card. NL The first card you play each turn is played twice. Costs 1 additional [B] NL for each time this card is played or exhausted.

Rainbow.NAME: Rainbow
Rainbow.DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 Lightning. NL Channel 1 Frost. NL Channel 1 Dark. NL Gain 1 Orb slots. NL Exhaust.
Rainbow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 Lightning. NL Channel 1 Frost. NL Channel 1 Dark. NL Gain 1 Orb slots. NL Exhaust.

Reprogram.NAME: Multi-Program
Reprogram.DESCRIPTION: Lose X Focus. NL Gain X Strength. NL Gain X Dexterity. NL Exhaust.
Reprogram.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose X+1 Focus. NL Gain X+1 Strength. NL Gain X+1 Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

Creative AI.NAME: Creative AI
Creative AI.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add 1 of 3 random Power cards and add the chosen card into your hand.
Creative AI.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add 1 of 3 random Power cards and add the chosen card into your hand.

Machine Learning.NAME: Machine Learning
Machine Learning.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, the AI will adjust the parameters based on your state to channel 1 random Orb.

Amplify.NAME: Amplify
Amplify.DESCRIPTION: Your next Power card is played twice.
Amplify.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your next !M! Power cards are played twice.

SuperRobot:Frost Protection.NAME: Frost Protection
SuperRobot:Frost Protection.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you receive unblocked attack damage, Channel !M! Frost.
SuperRobot:Frost Protection.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you receive unblocked attack damage, Channel !M! Frost.

SuperRobot:Machine Awakening.NAME: Machine Awakening
SuperRobot:Machine Awakening.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Lost all Machine Learning. Gain an equivalent amount of Focus. At the end of your turn, the AI will channel N random orbs according to your situation. N equals your current max Orb slots/2.
SuperRobot:Machine Awakening.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lost all Machine Learning. Gain an equivalent amount of Focus. At the end of your turn, the AI will channel N random orbs according to your situation. N equals your current max Orb slots/2.

Recycle.NAME: Recycle
Recycle.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL Gain [B] equal to its cost. NL Invalid for *Nightmare *Echo.

SuperRobot:Snow Storm.NAME: Snow Storm
SuperRobot:Snow Storm.DESCRIPTION: Get into Snowstorm Weather. NL Whenever you play a Power card, Channel 1 Frost. NL Put a *Weather *Transform into your draw pile.
SuperRobot:Snow Storm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Get into the Snowstorm Weather. NL Whenever you play a Power card, Channel 1 Frost. NL Put a *Weather *Transform+ into your draw pile.

SuperRobot:Weather Transform.NAME: Weather Transform
SuperRobot:Weather Transform.DESCRIPTION: Transform your Weather. NL If Exhausted, Clear Up.

Storm.NAME: Storm
Storm.DESCRIPTION: Get into Storm Weather. NL Whenever you play a Power card, Channel 1 Lightning.
Storm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Get into Storm Weather. NL Whenever you play a Power card, Channel 1 Lightning.
